titleStmt.title: F. W. Asbury et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG11580

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
Camp Fry near Danville Ky.
Dec 19th 1862
His Excellency
Gov. J. F. Robinson
Sir

Your petitioners the undersigned members of Co. B. 1st Batt Ky Cavalry. are desirous of being transfered to the 10th Redg Ky. Cav. as we have many friends and Relations in Sd Redg we therefore Respectfully Solicit your Excellence to grant us Such transfer We haveing the consent of Our Respective Commanders there to you will lay us under many Obligations by an answer at your Earliest convenience

Vary Respectfully yours
Obt Servts
F. W. Asbury, Sergt
Peter, Mann, private
Alexander, Curtis, pr
I give my full and free Consent to their Transfer

Capt J H Coffman
J B Buchanan Capt of compy D.
your Exellency will see that we have the Consent of our Capt J H Coffman and J. B. Buchanan Commanding Batt,

J. H Coffman
Danville Ky
Dec 19/62
Coffman J. H.
Capt Cav.
consents for several of his men to be transfered to 10.th Ky Cav

Military
F. W. Asbury &c
Pettn to be changed
